about_the_game:
DISCLAIMER: Our playable demo is heavily in development and is missing many core features we are planning for DIESELDOME. It will have bugs and various other issues.

DIESELDOME: Oil & Blood is a RomanPunk FPS with Movement Shooter and Survivors-like mechanics. In every run, you will create absurdly powerful builds against hundreds of enemies at a time while parkouring your way through the Dome.

Will you be a petrol-powered gatling gun berserker that shoots 20 homing bullets that explode or a V8-powered auto-crossbow sniper that wall-runs, slides and triple jumps their way through their enemies?

  • A RomanPunk FPS with Survivor-Like mechanics, inspired by Vampire Survivors, ULTRAKILL, and more.

  • Different characters each carrying their unique weapon, abilities, and freedom contracts which is a progression system unique to each character, with upgrades, weapon skins, perks, and more. Will you be able to earn back the freedom of each Domerunner?

  • 70+ unique game-changing perks that can be synergized to devastate the Dome.

The crowd itself determines your fate in the DIESELDOME. While you’re fighting your way through the pitiful grunts, The experienced waves of gladiators can steal the spotlight away from you by trying to capture regions. These unique warriors warped by the Empire will make it much harder for you to stand out to the crowd.

  • Unlock new skill trees, maps, and passive skills while taking risky bets using our randomly generated betting system to become a champion of the people. 

  • Experience the thrill of randomized events that transform the way you play and explore the Dome! Brace yourself for unexpected challenges and exciting goals, ensuring every match is a fresh and unique adventure.

  • Face 9+ abominations, made living by the Empire such as the Phalanx Tank or eagles experimented into being fighter planes. More will be added during early access.

  • Rise through the champions of the arena, dueling bloodthirsty bosses with unique move-sets. It is said that Ceasar himself awaits those who have become the ultimate gladiator.

When in Rome, parkour like the Romans do. Thanks to modern Imperial technology, your body is an unstoppable engine of flesh. Mobility is life in the Dome and by the Emperor, you can move like a V8-powered chariot!

  • Parkour your way to glory by wall-running, sliding, quad-jumping, and more.

  • Through perks, glide like Mercury, grenade-boost to battle, and Grapple-Hook your way of a sticky situation.

  • The environment itself is both a tool and an adversary. The machinery and platforms of the arena can help you traverse the Dome like an eagle; If you have the skills for it.

  • A RomanPunk FPS with Survivors-Like and Movement Shooter mechanics.

  • 4 different characters each carrying their unique weapon, ability, and freedom contracts which is a progression system unique to each character, with upgrades, weapon skins, perks, and more. 

  • 70+ unique abilities that can be synergized.

  • Parkour mechanics including wall-running, gliding, rocket-boosting, jump-slamming, and more.

  • Multiple maps, inspired by the 2000s era of FPS games, with 4 uniquely themed regions that were hand-crafted to be parkoured. 

  • A randomized event system that changes the way you play and navigate the Dome while providing challenges and goals to create a unique match each time.

  • Various power-ups that grant the player short but powerful abilities.

  • Skill trees, passive skills, map unlocks, and unique character upgrades.

  • A randomly generated betting system to earn gold. More bets to come soon!

  • Rise through champions that are powerful bosses with unique movesets. 

  • Face 9+ abominations, each with a unique role.

content_descriptors.notes: DieselDome contains extreme graphic violence including dismemberment, gore, and blood.

name: DIESELDOME: Oil & Blood

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or +
  • Processor: Intel i5-12400F
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1650
  • Storage: 3500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or +
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070
  • Storage: 3500 MB available space

short_description: DieselDome: Oil & Blood is an FPS with Movement Shooter and Survivors-Like mechanics. In every run, you will create absurdly powerful builds against hundreds of enemies at a time while facing the judgment of the crowd. It takes place in an original RomanPunk universe.
supported_languages:
English*, Italian, Greek, Japanese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
